00008 
00009 #ifndef BOOST_UTILITY_BASE_FROM_MEMBER_HPP
00010 #define BOOST_UTILITY_BASE_FROM_MEMBER_HPP
00011 
00012 #include <boost/utility_fwd.hpp>  // required for parameter defaults
00013 
00014 
00015 namespace boost
00016 {
00017 
00018 //  Base-from-member class template  -----------------------------------------//
00019 
00020 // Helper to initialize a base object so a derived class can use this
00021 // object in the initialization of another base class.  Used by
00022 // Dietmar Kuehl from ideas by Ron Klatcho to solve the problem of a
00023 // base class needing to be initialized by a member.
00024 
00025 // Contributed by Daryle Walker
00026 
00027 template < typename MemberType, int UniqueID >
00028 class base_from_member
00029 {
00030 protected:
00031     MemberType  member;
00032 
00033     base_from_member()
00034         : member()
00035         {}
00036 
00037     template< typename T1 >
00038     explicit base_from_member( T1 x1 )
00039         : member( x1 )
00040         {}
00041 
00042     template< typename T1, typename T2 >
00043     base_from_member( T1 x1, T2 x2 )
00044         : member( x1, x2 )
00045         {}
00046 
00047     template< typename T1, typename T2, typename T3 >
00048     base_from_member( T1 x1, T2 x2, T3 x3 )
00049         : member( x1, x2, x3 ) 
00050         {}
00051 
00052     template< typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4 >
00053     base_from_member( T1 x1, T2 x2, T3 x3, T4 x4 )
00054         : member( x1, x2, x3, x4 ) 
00055         {}
00056 
00057     template< typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5 >
00058     base_from_member( T1 x1, T2 x2, T3 x3, T4 x4, T5 x5 )
00059         : member( x1, x2, x3, x4, x5 ) 
00060         {}
00061 
00062     template< typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5,
00063      typename T6 >
00064     base_from_member( T1 x1, T2 x2, T3 x3, T4 x4, T5 x5, T6 x6 )
00065         : member( x1, x2, x3, x4, x5, x6 ) 
00066         {}
00067 
00068     template< typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5,
00069      typename T6, typename T7 >
00070     base_from_member( T1 x1, T2 x2, T3 x3, T4 x4, T5 x5, T6 x6, T7 x7 )
00071         : member( x1, x2, x3, x4, x5, x6, x7 ) 
00072         {}
00073 
00074     template< typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5,
00075      typename T6, typename T7, typename T8 >
00076     base_from_member( T1 x1, T2 x2, T3 x3, T4 x4, T5 x5, T6 x6, T7 x7, T8 x8 )
00077         : member( x1, x2, x3, x4, x5, x6, x7, x8 ) 
00078         {}
00079 
00080     template< typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5,
00081      typename T6, typename T7, typename T8, typename T9 >
00082     base_from_member( T1 x1, T2 x2, T3 x3, T4 x4, T5 x5, T6 x6, T7 x7, T8 x8,
00083      T9 x9 )
00084         : member( x1, x2, x3, x4, x5, x6, x7, x8, x9 ) 
00085         {}
00086 
00087     template< typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5,
00088      typename T6, typename T7, typename T8, typename T9, typename T10 >
00089     base_from_member( T1 x1, T2 x2, T3 x3, T4 x4, T5 x5, T6 x6, T7 x7, T8 x8,
00090      T9 x9, T10 x10 )
00091         : member( x1, x2, x3, x4, x5, x6, x7, x8, x9, x10 ) 
00092         {}
00093 
00094 };  // boost::base_from_member
00095 
00096 }  // namespace boost
00097 
00098 
00099 #endif  // BOOST_UTILITY_BASE_FROM_MEMBER_HPP
